getRotationMatrixSORA

public static double[] getRotationMatrixSORA(double[] phi)
A simultaneous orthogonal rotations angle (SORA) is a vector representing angular orientation of a rigid-body relative to some reference frame. The components of this vector are equal to the angles of three simultaneous rotations around the rigid body's intrinsic coordinate system axes, initially aligned with the axes of the reference frame, needed to move the rigid body to its current angular orientation.

Parameters:
sora - vector = (phi_x, phi_y, phi_z)

                                             double y,
                                             double z)
